definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: [[לָעָָיִן]], on NE. border of Can. Nu 34:11, LXX e)pi\ phga/v

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: in Negeb of Judah Jos 15:32 (+ [[וְרִמּוֹן]]), Levit. city Jos 21:16 (but LXXB Asa rd. [[עָשָׁן]], as 1Ch 6:44), appar.=

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Jos 19:7 (+ ´[[ר]]; assigned to Simeon), ´[[ר]] ´[[וׇע]] 1Ch 4:32 (rd. prob. ´[[וְעֵין ר]]); prob. mod. Umm er-Ramā-mīn, c. 18 miles SW. from Hebrom, Buhl:Geogr.183.—Vid. [[עֵין רִמּוֹן]] below
